<h3 id="上周题目：蓝色三角形的面积">上周题目：蓝色三角形的面积</h3>

![enter image description here](https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/f441758feba067f6570b14a0c38b36892a8a7e67/166_322_1617_970/master/1617.jpg?width=620&quality=45&auto=format&fit=max&dpr=2&s=202d71b4049b42d0f49b9d1d20b1d62d)

<blockquote>
以上有若干正方形，左下的那个面积为5。问蓝色三角形面积是多少？
</blockquote>

答案：蓝色三角形面积是10。

这道题发出后 ，反响极为热烈。有人用坐标和向量方法解决。还有人问：最右边的正方形大小是多少？这个正方形大小是未知，这既是难点，但也是一个思路提示！

既然最右边正方形大小不确定，所以可以假设其为任意大小。最极端的就是假设这个正方形大小为0，然后计算…。但我们有更好的，清晰且简单的解决方案。

首先在最右边正方形中，添加一条对角线作为辅助线：

![enter image description here](https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/63bed99d0ba82a2d44ac80539938beb940536899/173_216_1371_822/master/1371.jpg?width=620&quality=45&auto=format&fit=max&dpr=2&s=ed14d1d052a6c76e479f4ad0697dc682)

这条对角线与蓝色三角形的最短边是平行的。那么可以视为：蓝色三角形的“底”是这条最短变，“高”是这条最短边到这条辅助线之间的距离。根据“等底等高三角形面积相等”的原理，可知：

![enter image description here](https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/63bed99d0ba82a2d44ac80539938beb940536899/135_1223_1380_828/master/1380.jpg?width=620&quality=45&auto=format&fit=max&dpr=2&s=4ded48a7036cf69c453284d5735b8eaf)

原来的蓝色三角形面积面积与上图中的蓝色角型面积相等（此时会发现，假设大正方形大小为0是有道理的）。到这一步，已经很好算了，但我们可以再“简单”点，看下图：

![enter image description here](https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/63bed99d0ba82a2d44ac80539938beb940536899/106_2285_1292_775/master/1292.jpg?width=620&quality=45&auto=format&fit=max&dpr=2&s=b1c65653d05cb021528a094830e7fbeb)

同样原理，上一图中的三角形的面积与上图中的蓝色三角形面积是相等的。因此，心算可得，原来的三角形面积是10！

有很多人答了50，大概是因为把原题中“小正方形面积为5”，看成了“小正方形边长为5”，看题不仔细，考试两行泪！

我还收到了署名“初二学生袁涌银”的手写解答：

![enter image description here](https://pic4.zhimg.com/80/v2-a1297c549a337e700f33d2d81d693d3f_hd.jpg)

👍！所有答对的答案已置为精华留言。

<h3 id="上期加餐题：整除100的概率">上期加餐题：整除100的概率</h3>

<blockquote>
给定任意三个正整数x, y, z，它们的积：xyz，能被100整除的概率是多少？
</blockquote>

答案：12.43%。

首先<span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml">100=2×2×5×5100=2\times2\times5\times5</span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.64444em;vertical-align:0;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">0</span><span class="mord">0</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.72777em;vertical-align:-.08333em;"></span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">×</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.72777em;vertical-align:-.08333em;"></span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">×</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.72777em;vertical-align:-.08333em;"></span><span class="mord">5</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">×</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.64444em;vertical-align:0;"></span><span class="mord">5</span></span></span></span></span>，因此我们考虑，三个数的乘积<span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml">xyzxyz</span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.625em;vertical-align:-.19444em;"></span><span class="mord mathit">x</span><span style="margin-right:.03588em;" class="mord mathit">y</span><span style="margin-right:.04398em;" class="mord mathit">z</span></span></span></span></span>有多大概率含有**至少**两个2的因子和**至少**两个5的因子。

xyz含有至少两个2的因子的概率是：

1-没有2的因子的概率-恰有1个2的因子的概率

因为一半的整数可以被2整除，因此三个整数乘积不含有2的因子的概率是<span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml">(1/2)3=1/8(1/2)^3=1/8</span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1.06411em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mclose"><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:.814108em;"><span class="" style="top:-3.063em;margin-right:.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight">3</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">8</span></span></span></span></span>

恰有1个2的因子的概率是：其中两个数没有2的因子，另一个恰有1个2的因子。所有奇数没有2的因子；而所有偶数中的一半恰可被2整除，且不可被4整除。

因此xyz恰有一个2的因子的概率是：

<span class="katex--display"><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml">3⋅(1/2)⋅(1/2)⋅(1/4)=3/163\cdot(1/2)\cdot(1/2)\cdot(1/4)=3/16</span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.64444em;vertical-align:0;"></span><span class="mord">3</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">4</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mord">3</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">6</span></span></span></span></span></span>

所以，xyz含有至少两个2的因子的概率是：

<span class="katex--display"><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml">1−1/8−3/16=11/161-1/8-3/16=11/16</span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.72777em;vertical-align:-.08333em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">8</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mord">3</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">6</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">6</span></span></span></span></span></span>

用类似方法，可以计算出xyz有至少2个5的因子的概率是：

<span class="katex--display"><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml">1−(4/5)3−3⋅(1/5−1/25)(4/5)2=113/6251-(4/5)^3-3\cdot(1/5-1/25)(4/5)^2=113/625</span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.72777em;vertical-align:-.08333em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mspace" style="height:1.11411em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord">4</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">5</span><span class="mclose"><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:.864108em;"><span class="" style="top:-3.113em;margin-right:.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight">3</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" class="mclose"><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:.864108em;"><span class="" style="top:-3.113em;margin-right:.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord class="mord">3</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">6</span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mord">5</span></span></span></span></span></span>

因此，xyz同时至少有两个2的因子和两个5的因子是上述两个概率的积：

<span class="katex--display"><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml">11/16×113/625=0.1243=12.43%11/16 \times 113/625 = 0.1243=12.43\%</span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">6</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">×</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">3</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord">6</span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mord">5</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.64444em;vertical-align:0;"></span><span class="mord">0</span><span class="mord">.</span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mord">4</span><span class="mord">3</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:.277778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:.80556em;vertical-align:-.05556em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord">2</span><span class="mord">.</span><span class="mord">4</span><span class="mord">3</span><span class="mord">%</span></span></span></span></span></span>
